sourcing.instructions: - Erbium Oxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: - Erbium Oxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. Measure out all the dry ingredients (Erbium Oxide, Iron Powder, Nickel Powder, Phosphorus) accurately using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out all the dry ingredients (Erbium Oxide, Iron Powder, Nickel Powder, Phosphorus) accurately using a digital scale.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow the temperature to decrease naturally to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow the temperature to decrease naturally to room temperature.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible.
